channel.title: Post Your Pipe Pics. ===0
channel.description: since i'm guessing at least 15%+ of the moparscape community smoke weed thought i would make this.... Post a picture of YOUR pipe meant for smoking weed/tobacco... AND guys BE SERIOUS post a real pictures of your pipe ive some really kick ass ones now you can show your's off. ill post mine later after i go chill with some friends.

item.title: Post Your Pipe Pics. ===0
item.dc:creator: @NewbieNewty Newty
item.description:
@NewbieNewty wrote:

The rule around here is that generally all drug related threads should be kept on the other side of the forums.

The reason is that the userbase on moparscape is much younger/more impressionable then the users of moparisthebest. So we have always tried to keep things like drug threads strictly on the other side.

Locked, sorry.

Read full topic

item.title: Post Your Pipe Pics. ===0
item.dc:creator: @T41 t4
item.description:
@T41 wrote:

[quote=“codyskate5021, post:35, topic:423339”][quote author=imsuperman05 link=topic=525983.msg3830732#msg3830732 date=1322537053]

That is a bad ass pipe, might invest one day.

That’s a cheapo small ass pipe bought at a hess gas station.
Nobody needs to be smoking until there 18 and mature enough to handle it.

my pipe is small so i can smoke after school right off campus… our officer is cool he wont do anything but he looks at us with shame

Doesn’t mean he’s cool, just means he’s corrupt and looking the other way when somebody is breaking the law.
[/quote]
i guess i agree. i would think wrong of it because i am in the group thats doing the drugs

mine :o[/quote]

RETURN THE FUCKING ARTIFACT TO POKEMOPOLIS OR ELSE
